column1: International Business and Marketing Management - MSc
column5: Our MSc International Business and Marketing Management course is accredited by the Association of MBAs (AMBA) and the Chartered Management Institute (CMI). It will prepare you for a successful international career with a commercial or not-for-profit organisation.You will learn to:identify, analyse and evaluate a range of business related issuesdevelop suitable responses to these problemsselect the most appropriate course of actionYou will focus your studies within the area of marketing to prepare you for a range of careers, including:
column7: Home (UK) full time - £11,400 Home (UK) part time - £5,700 Home (UK) sandwich (placement) - £2,000 International full time - £16,800 International sandwich (placement) - £2,000
column9: 1 or 2 years full time, 2 years part time
